programme.title: FIGHT SPORTS MMA Nkazimulo Zulu vs. Jake Hadley
programme.desc: This episode features a flyweight championship bout as Jake Hadley takes on the veteran Nkazimulo Zulu. Bonus coverage includes Mutuale Basambombo vs. HP Van Staden and Christian Bobo vs. Adrian Sanchez.

programme.title: WCCB Marco Huck vs. Hugo Hernan Garay
programme.desc: With the WBO Cruiserweight World Championship on the line, titleholder Marco Huck (33-1) defends against veteran contender Hugo Garay (34-6) at the Olympia Eissportzentrum in Munich, Germany. Huck, fighting in his adoptive home country, was making the 7th consecutive defense of his championship.

programme.title: WCCB Firat Arslan vs. Yoan Pablo Hernandez
programme.desc: From the Messehall in Erfurt, Germany, IBF Cruiserweight World Champion Yoan Pablo Hernandez looks to defend his title for the fourth time, taking on former WBA Cruiserweight World Champion Firat Arslan. Hernandez comes into this bout having won fourteen straight fights, including recent back to back victories over former champion Steve Cunningham.

programme.title: In the Philippines
programme.desc: Episode 1: Philippines - Hosts Jimmy Smith and Doug Anderson learn the Fight Discipline of Kali - one of the deadliest, most ancient fighting systems on earth, and the Martial Art of Knives and Sticks with Masters Cristino Vasquez and Leo T. Gaje Jr.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Juan Manuel Marquez vs. Michael Katsidis
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is a highly-praised and hard-hitting lightweight championship fight featuring Juan Manuel Marquez and Michael Katsidis that was named HBO's 2010 Fight of the Year. Also on the card, welterweight champion Victor Ortiz.

programme.title: Fukuoka, Japan Episode 5
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Episode 5 from Fukuoka, Japan.

programme.title: Wide World of Fights Floyd Mayweather Jr vs. Oscar De La Hoya
programme.desc: This episode features the WBC World super welterweight title between Floyd Mayweather, Jr. and Oscar De La Hoya that made $165 million in total gross revenue, making it the richest fight ever, as well as kickboxing, sumo and more!

programme.title: Pariah: Sonny Liston
programme.desc: Was Sonny Liston murdered? This four-part documentary series explores the life and untimely death of boxing legend Charles 'Sonny' Liston, who became the heavyweight champion of the world when he knocked out Floyd Patterson in 1962. Unfortunately, just eight years later, he was found dead in his Las Vegas home from an alleged heroin overdose. Suspicion regarding the real cause of his death has continued to this day. Episode 3 of 4.

programme.title: WCCB Kim Clavel vs. Evelin Bermudez
programme.desc: The WBO & IBF Light Flyweight World Championship will be at stake when Kim Clavel steps into the ring in her home of Laval, Quebec, Canada to challenge the champion Evelin Bermudez of Argentina. The former WBC World Champion, Clavel boasts a 17-1 record, recently rebounding from a decision loss to Yesica Nery Plata where she dropped her title.

programme.title: Rabat 2023 - Episode 2
programme.desc: Rabat, Morocco welcomes one of the most anticipated events in Martial Arts this year as the Karate 1 Premier League returns. The last edition of Karate 1 Premier League in Rabat saw nearly 200 athletes from 44 countries participating in this event, one of the most prestigious in the world of Karate. The World Karate Federation expects another tremendous turnout, featuring Olympic medalists and world-ranked competitors, when the Karate 1 Premier League is back in Rabat, Morocco.

programme.title: Wide World of Fights Daniel Ponce De Leon vs. Antonio Escalante
programme.desc: Wide World Of Fights includes all styles of fighting from around the world in one show! This episode features a featherweight battle that ends in a brutal knockout between Daniel Ponce De Leon and Antonio Escalante, as well as kickboxing, sumo, arm wrestling and more!

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Shane Mosley vs. Ricardo Mayorga
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is "Sugar" Shane Mosley facing Ricardo Mayorga in a light middleweight title fight, the first of two bouts between the two, that features an exciting last-minute finish. Also on the card, action from former champs Juan Manuel Marquez and Juan Diaz.

programme.title: Nagoya, Japan: Show 1
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 1 featuring Harumafuji, Kotooshu, Goeido and Kotoshogiku from the Nagoya basho, 2015.

programme.title: Men's Forms Championship
programme.desc: This episode features highlights from the CMX Weapons Championship and the Men's Forms Championship at the ISKA US Open Championships held at Disney World, Orlando, FL, USA.

programme.title: Pariah: Sonny Liston
programme.desc: Was Sonny Liston murdered? This four-part documentary series explores the life and untimely death of boxing legend Charles 'Sonny' Liston, who became the heavyweight champion of the world when he knocked out Floyd Patterson in 1962. Unfortunately, just eight years later, he was found dead in his Las Vegas home from an alleged heroin overdose. Suspicion regarding the real cause of his death has continued to this day. Episode 4 of 4.

programme.desc: From the strict codes of Hammurabi to the secretly malevolent evil eye, history is full of acts committed in the name of revenge. We uncover the forces that have driven individuals to seek vengeance.

programme.title: Rocky Mountain Ranch

programme.desc: Rakshi comes up with a convincing tale for not turning up for the date. Charan believes but Tobor does not. Charan angry with Tobor for doubting Rakshi's integrity shuts down Tobor. In the meantime, Kelvin and Pravin Banu impersonate Madhan and Suseela during the meeting.

programme.title: Road To Eternity
programme.desc: The Envoy of Wisdom sympathised with mankind in their affliction, he swore to save all living beings before becoming a Buddha. He had transmigration of his soul into human being and named as HUI TAK (Lam Ka Tung)._x000D__x000D_TAK was very clever but aloof from fame and wealth. He admired a famous doctor’s granddaughter FUNG (Chan Miu Ying) and they were intimate to each other. On the other hand, PRINCESS MAN SHUI (Tong Ying Ying) liked TAK very much because of his intelligence.

programme.title: Fate of The Clairvoyant
programme.desc: Pui (Amy Chan) was a dutiful wife and mother. She devoted all her time to her family and didn’t realize her unattractive outlook was driving her husband away. She was shocked when she discovered her husband, Wo (Keung Tai Wai), was having an affair with the sexy movie star, Ling (Valerie Chow). Her heart broke when Wo asked for a divorce._x000D__x000D_Pui’s confidence was badly shattered.

programme.title: Go With The Float
programme.desc: Former stuntman Hung Sap-yat (Wayne Lai) hooks up with his buddies, who are also former film crew members, Chung Chi-wai (Willie Wai), Fong Sum (Wong Yee Kam), Lee Sai-fong (Timothy Cheng) and Ng Kam-yin (Jimmy Au) as they want to organize a retrospective for Sap-yat’s late wife Miu Miu (Mimi Kung). They reminisce about the old days. The chums even regroup and shoot a movie based on a completed screenplay entitled Flying Skill from yesteryear.

programme.title: Pillow Case Of Mystery, A
programme.desc: SZE SAI LUN (Au Yeung Chun Wah, Bobby), the magistrate of Jiangdu County once makes a mistake, making an innocent person taking its own life by hanging. Since then, LUN loses his faith in himself and his will is down. Later by chance, LUN obtains a Dream-pillow. Whenever he comes across any difficult cases, the Pillow-spirit (Lo Hoi Pang) will appear in his dream and present him the puzzle that holds the key to crack the case.

programme.title: Nourish

programme.title: Move

programme.title: News Watch 9 (B)

programme.title: 50th Anniversary of Japan-Vietnam Diplomacy Drama "Echoes of Vietnam" Eps. 3 (Fi
programme.desc: A special drama commemorating 50 years of diplomatic relations between Japan and Vietnam. Conductor Sakura (Hamada Gaku) who is asked to rebuild an orchestra in Vietnam, travels to Hanoi. Together with his interpreter, Morioka, he interacts with the orchestra members who are unique personalities to overcome cultural barriers and become a first-rate orchestra.

programme.title: Night Serial Drama "Someday, in the Weightless Sky" Eps. 6
programme.desc: Four high school girls once dreamed of exploring space together as members of the astronomy club. Now grown up and walking their own paths, they unexpectedly reconnect with the dreams they had long forgotten. "If it’s a microsatellite… maybe we can still aim for space, even now!" Encouraged by their younger selves, they embark on a second youth - chasing the stars once more.

programme.title: Until My Days Become Words
programme.desc: This talk variety show explores the words that color your daily life through literary work and manga, featuring writers and word enthusiasts.

programme.title: News Commentary
programme.desc: NHK news commentators give their views on current issues.

programme.title: News & Weather
programme.desc: The latest up-to-date news and nationwide weather information.

programme.title: World Weather
programme.desc: Weather information of the different areas around the world.

programme.title: Lifestyle Lab for The Prime Generation
programme.desc: This high-quality educational program, hosted by Tokiwa Takako, is designed for middle-aged and senior viewers with more free time, exploring ways to enjoy a fulfilling adult life through various topics, including food, health, and lifestyle.

programme.title: Twisters
programme.desc: Kate Cooper, Tyler Owens and their competing teams find themselves right in the path of multiple storm systems converging over central Oklahoma and will be in the fight of their lives.

programme.title: Freediver
programme.desc: Freediving champion Alexey Molchanov sets out on a daring mission to break five world records.

programme.title: The Hangover
programme.desc: When three friends get together for one last weekend-long bachelor party in Vegas, they think they had a good time.

programme.title: Bean
programme.desc: The laughs are nonstop from London to Los Angeles! Comedian Rowan Atkinson is Bean!

programme.title: The Secret Life Of Pets
programme.desc: When a pampered terrier and his owner’s newly adopted pet get lost in New York City, they must put aside their differences to survive the journey back home.

programme.title: Sinbad: Legend Of The Seven Seas
programme.desc: Brad Pitt and Catherine Zeta-Jones lend their voices to this adventure-filled animated tale.

programme.title: Pitch Perfect
programme.desc: A rebellious student goes beyond her comfort zone to join her college’s all-female a capella group.

programme.title: Footloose
programme.desc: A city kid moves to a small town where rock 'n' roll and dancing had been banned, and his rebellious spirit shakes up the populace.

programme.title: Troy
programme.desc: A spectacular retelling of The Iliad, Troy is an epic tale of passion, heroism, betrayal and war.

programme.title: Twisters
programme.desc: Kate Cooper, Tyler Owens and their competing teams find themselves right in the path of multiple storm systems converging over central Oklahoma and will be in the fight of their lives.

programme.title: Mr. Bean's Holiday
programme.desc: On his journey to a French Riviera vacation, Mr. Bean falls face first into a series of hilarious mishaps.

programme.title: Dog Man
programme.desc: Half dog, half man, Dog Man is sworn to protect and serve...as long as he isn’t distracted by squirrels.

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts And Where To Find Them
programme.desc: A Magizoologist arrives in New York amid tensions in the wizarding world only to be branded as a fugitive as he tries to recover his missing beasts.

programme.title: Hellboy: The Crooked Man
programme.desc: Hellboy and a rookie BPRD agent get stranded in 1950s rural Appalachia, only to discover a small community haunted by witches, led by the Crooked Man.

programme.title: Save the Date
programme.desc: Max bets Phoebe she can't turn off being a superhero and go on a normal date. Chloe helps Phoebe do well on the date, but Max tries to sabotage it by crying wolf. Suddenly, a real supervillain emerges and puts Max and Chloe in serious danger.

programme.title: Guardians of the Ponytail
programme.desc: Danger Force is hired by Rivalton's Duke Wellington to protect him and his ponytail from his jealous uncle, Archduke Fernando. They at first think it's easy money, until they find out The Archduke hired Ray and Henry Hart to capture Duke Wellington.

programme.title: Left in the Dark / Get the Message
programme.desc: When Lincoln wants to watch the finale of his favorite show, he has to beat each sister to get to the couch first! // After Lincoln leaves a scathing voicemail on Lori's phone, he realizes he has to erase it before Lori hears it.

programme.title: Heavy Meddle / Making the Case
programme.desc: Lincoln is tired of his sisters meddling in his business until he's being picked on at school. // Lincoln secretly videos his sister's most embarrassing moments in order to win a video contest at school.

programme.title: Driving Miss Hazy / No Guts, No Glori
programme.desc: Tired of doing favors to get a ride from Lori, Lincoln decides it's time to help Leni pass her driver's test. // Lincoln conspires with the rest of his sisters to overthrow Lori's tyranny as their 'baby'sitter.

programme.title: Bishop Makes Her Move
programme.desc: The origin of the woman called BISHOP! Why does she hate mutants? What is the secret of the Mechazoids? And exactly what happened the night the Turtles fell into Bishop's trap?

programme.title: Sold! / Lame and Fortune
programme.desc: When SpongeBob and Patrick think their homes have been sold, they move away - much to Squidward's delight. // When fortune cookies start predicting the future, Plankton realizes he can twist them to his own evil schemes.

programme.title: Sandy's Nutmare / Bulletin Board
programme.desc: Sandy creates the latest acorn-based food sensation, but her tree pays the price for her greed. // SpongeBob erects a community bulletin board in the Krusty Krab, but anonymous reviews posted on it lead to trouble.

programme.title: Food Con Castaways / Snail Mail
programme.desc: The gang heads to a food convention, but things go awry when they become stranded in the woods. // SpongeBob accidentally fibs to his pen pal, but when his friend comes to visit, he must keep the ruse going!

programme.title: Broken Alarm
programme.desc: SpongeBob breaks his precious alarm clock, but nothing else is loud enough to wake him up on time.

programme.title: At Home, On the Lam / Pick Patrick's Path
programme.desc: Bunny must punish Patrick for chocolate-flavored crimes. // The Lawnies vote for what Patrick does next.

programme.title: Mikey Takes Charge
programme.desc: Mikey and Genghis Frog are sent into the storm on a supply run to the local market when they encounter the electrifying LEE THE EEL! Now Mikey has to step up and be a LEADER!

programme.title: Splinter and April Fight a Goldfish
programme.desc: When the Lair floods, April goes to save Splinter... but he won't leave the sewer! To make matters worse, the mutant called GOLDFIN comes with a warning... stay out of his way, or else!

programme.title: 28 Puddings Later / Trial and Hair-ror
programme.desc: When Hazel tries to make Pudding Day at school fair for everyone, she accidentally starts a pudding apocalypse. // When Hazel wishes her hair had "spirit" for a school contest, she finds it has more personality than she bargained for!

programme.title: Cookie's Court
programme.desc: After losing Hazel to Cosmo and Wanda during the Wish Trials, a scheming Cookie returns for revenge.

programme.title: Smurfing Places / Poet Slam
programme.desc: Gargamel switches bodies with Papa Smurf and only Timid knows the truth. Will he be brave enough to speak up? // After Poet mentors Lily in rhyming, he experiences "poet block" during the poet slam contest.

programme.title: Say Smurf for the Camera! / Manners Matter
programme.desc: Handy invents a camera so Painter can make portraits of all the village's inhabitants. // Papa Smurf is nervous about the new Nature Fairy coming to visit so he asks Willow to teach the Smurfs manners.

programme.title: The Guest Who Wouldn't Leave / Where's My Smurfway?
programme.desc: After Wild sprains his ankle, he stays in Papa Smurf's house to recuperate while Papa Smurf is away. // When Blossom misplaces Brainy's beloved Smurfway, she has to find it before Brainy finds out.

programme.title: Ay Fidelity / Cut the Chisme
programme.desc: When Bobby and Par are left in charge of Ziggy's shop, they must resist jamming with the shop's musical treasures. // The family tries to stop their notorious chismoso Hector from gossiping all over town but can he stay quiet?

programme.title: Sidekickin' Chicken / Silent Fight
programme.desc: After hearing about a contest to find El Falcon's next sidekick, Carl becomes El Pollito and tries to win! Once Carlitos falls asleep, Carl and CJ must conduct all their playing - and fighting - in absolute silence!

programme.title: Kick Some Bot / Salvador Doggy
programme.desc: Sid faces off against Lisa Loud in the Great Lakes City robotics competition! // When faced with a deadline and no inspiration, Frida tries to use Lalo's paintings as her own!

programme.title: The Uncredible Journey / Host-a-Palooza
programme.desc: Tinkle, Ouchie, and Pinkeye must venture back home together after being taken away by mistake. // Patrick gets injured, so his family members take turns hosting the show.

programme.title: Squidness Protection / Dome Alone
programme.desc: Squidward's amazing new life in witness protection is threatened after SpongeBob and Patrick discover his whereabouts. // While stuck in her dome, Sandy suspects Plankton's up to no good and recruits Patrick to investigate.

programme.title: Wary Gary / Pinned
programme.desc: SpongeBob goes to extreme lengths to trick Gary into going to the vet. // SpongeBob become desperate when he accidentally gets pinned under his exercise equipment and must wait for help to arrive.

programme.title: Jeffy T's Prankwell Emporium / A Taste of Plankton
programme.desc: Squidward's prankster dad visits and brings all sorts of gags with him (much to Squidward's annoyance). // Plankton tries to get a taste of the secret formula by attaching himself to SpongeBob's tongue.

programme.title: Save the Date
programme.desc: Max bets Phoebe she can't turn off being a superhero and go on a normal date. Chloe helps Phoebe do well on the date, but Max tries to sabotage it by crying wolf. Suddenly, a real supervillain emerges and puts Max and Chloe in serious danger.

programme.title: An Imposter Among Us
programme.desc: Rick Twitler returns with a new plan to control Mika's mind through a spooky VR video game. It's up to Danger Force to exer-cise the Rick Twitler out of Mika before they're all plunged back into the Dark Ages for good.

programme.title: Secret Beef
programme.desc: With an invitation to Swellview's most exclusive restaurant, Henry decides to bring his boss, Ray, but finds it more complicated than expected.

programme.title: Raph Thinks It Through
programme.desc: Raph's strength won't save him when he's caught between the Mechazoids and the notorious street gang known as Purple Dragons! Raph's going to have to use his head to get out of this one!

programme.title: The Odd Father / Long Shot
programme.desc: Carlos has to choose Carlitos' Padrino in time for his Christening, but will he make the right call? // Carlota needs a PE credit in order to graduate, so she and Ronnie Anne set out to find the right sport for her.

programme.title: Flight Plan
programme.desc: Frida and Carlos go on a fancy plane ride, but Carl and CJ try to sneak on for an adventure of their own.

programme.title: Arbor Day Disarray / Ain't That the Tooth
programme.desc: Sandy gives her friends special saltwater trees, but they need more attention than she expected. // SpongeBob and Patrick mistake a burglar for the tooth fairy.

programme.title: Ma and Pa's Big Hurrah / Yellow Pavement
programme.desc: When SpongeBob's parents come to visit, their thirst for thrills comes as a big surprise. // You'll learn all you need to get your boating license in this educational driving film.

programme.title: The Flower Plot / SpongeBob on Parade
programme.desc: The Chum Bucket is replaced by a flower shop with a charming new owner. // The Krusty Krab enters a float in the annual Bikini Bottom Parade.

programme.title: Evil Spatula
programme.desc: SpongeBob replaces his broken spatula with one from Plankton, which may or may not have magical powers.

programme.title: Home Ecch! / Fun & Done!
programme.desc: Squidina hosts a television show to pass a home economics class. // Patrick and SpongeBob try to unlock a dull child's imagination.

programme.title: Karma Chameleon
programme.desc: The Changs go on vacation, leaving Ronnie Anne and her cousins to look after Cam, the chameleon snake.

programme.title: Skatey Cat / Weather Beaten
programme.desc: Nervous to jump back on her board after a bad wipeout, will Ronnie Anne ever skate again? feat. Lincoln Loud. // A powerful artifact is coming to the Great Lakes City museum and it brings along a storm for the Casagrandes!

programme.title: Hand-Me-Downer / Sleuth or Consequences
programme.desc: After Lincoln gets a pink hand-me-down bike from Lori, he borrows Lynn's cool BMX bike without telling her. // Someone clogged the Loud House toilet and Lincoln sets out to find out whodunit.

programme.title: The Butterfly Effect / The Green House
programme.desc: After spilling an experiment of Lisa's, Lincoln sets off a chain reaction that unravels the household. // In an effort to be more energy-efficient Lincoln rallies his family to stop using so much electricity.

programme.title: Operation Birthday Takeback Pt 1 / Operation Birthday Takeback Pt 2
programme.desc: When an old foe of Cosmo and Wanda's takes over Dev's birthday party as part of a money-making scheme, Hazel stages a series of zany traps to save the day. Meanwhile, Cosmo, Wanda, and Peri discover Dev's dad has been investigating Hazel!

programme.title: Wellsington Hotellsington / 1500 Minutes of Fame
programme.desc: Hazel wishes her apartment building were a luxury hotel for a sleepover, but finds herself too busy to enjoy it with friends. // When Hazel's wish for 1,500 minutes of fame angers Principal Krentz, she must find a way to speed up time.

programme.title: Sammy Suckerfish / Big League Bob
programme.desc: SpongeBob meets a magical fish. // SpongeBob cooks in the big leagues.

programme.title: The Dirty Bubble Bass / Sheldon SquarePants
programme.desc: Bubble Bass and the Dirty Bubble team up to become Bikini Bottom's nastiest nefarious nuisance. // Plankton joins the SquarePants family in the hope of becoming closer to SpongeBob (and the secret formula).

programme.title: Surf N' Turf
programme.desc: Sandy struggles to build a ship-in-a-bottle before a big contest, so SpongeBob calls in a little extra help.

programme.title: Fed Up / Shell Shock
programme.desc: Tired of monotonous meals, the kids make a plan to sabotage dinner so they can have pizza. // Lincoln and Ronnie Anne have to take care of an egg baby but Lincoln doesn't trust her with the fragile egg.

programme.title: Pulp Friction / Pets Peeved
programme.desc: Lincoln and Clyde submit an Ace Savvy comic to a meet-the-creator contest, but are foiled by a surprising nemesis. // When Lana brings home a new pet, who the kids adore, the four original Loud pets scheme to get rid of him.

programme.title: A Star is Scorned / Senior Moment
programme.desc: Lori regrets everything she hasn't done in high school, and vows to make up for lost time in her senior year. // When Lola realizes that double the cuteness could help her break into show business, she teams up with Lily.

programme.title: Department of Magical Violations / Teacher's Pal
programme.desc: Hazel, Cosmo, and Wanda must pass Wish Trials or Jorgen will assign Hazel to a new fairy who's more efficient, but less fun. // Nervous about not fitting in with the other kids at school, Hazel wishes to be friends with the teachers instead.

programme.title: An Imposter Among Us
programme.desc: Rick Twitler returns with a new plan to control Mika's mind through a spooky VR video game. It's up to Danger Force to exer-cise the Rick Twitler out of Mika before they're all plunged back into the Dark Ages for good.

programme.title: A Danger Among Us
programme.desc: After Miles has a vision that Rick Twitler is still around, Danger Force travels deep into the Man's Nest's to find him, running into an old foe along the way.

programme.title: Prank U Next
programme.desc: Max seeks help dealing with a mystery prankster at school from his old principal, who was always the target of his pranks. But Max fails to stop the pranks and quits the mission, prompting Chloe to confess that she was the prankster all along.

programme.title: Super Volcano
programme.desc: Activity in a dormant super volcano under Swellview makes Henry and Ray think the world is ending. Piper is convinced she has a gluten intolerance.

programme.title: The Pearl
programme.desc: The East River 3 are on the verge of victory! The Turtles and Mutanimals must team up to stop them, but not everything is as it seems... what is the PEARL and why does Goldfin want it?

programme.title: Two Pests in a Teapot / Partial Recall
programme.desc: When Granny Tentacles goes out for a spa day, Patrick and Squidina take care of her house. // After Plankton forgets who he is, the Dartfish family adopts him.

programme.title: Company Picnic / Pull Up a Barrel
programme.desc: Mr. Krabs throws a company picnic to boost morale, but Plankton is hosting his own on the same day! // Mr. Krabs regales SpongeBob with tales from his old Navy days.

programme.title: Big Bad Bubble Bass / Sea-Man Sponge Haters Club
programme.desc: Karen tells the fairytale of a nerd trying to steal an action figure from his three little neighbors. // Squidward hosts a secret "We Hate SpongeBob Club" at his house.

programme.title: Potato Puff / There Will Be Grease!
programme.desc: Mrs. Puff's new substitute teacher gives SpongeBob a crash course in driving. // Mr. Krabs and Plankton must work together after discovering a well of miracle-grease under their restaurants.

programme.title: A Dark & Story Night / Sand Hassles
programme.desc: When the lights go out in the Loud House, the kids entertain themselves by taking turns telling parts of a story. // Lucy and the Morticians' Club try to thwart plans for a school field trip to the beach.

programme.title: Space Jammed / Crown and Dirty
programme.desc: Annoyed by Leni's intrusive babysitting, Lisa accidentally blasts herself and Todd into space. // Lola tries to whip Mom into tip-top pageant condition for a Mother-Daughter pageant.

programme.title: Fly Pt. 1 / Fly Pt. 2
programme.desc: When Hazel has trouble adjusting to her move to Dimmadelphia, she discovers her neighbors, Cosmo and Wanda, are fairies!

programme.title: Race Against the Machine / My Fair Cat Lady
programme.desc: When Mr. Chang's job might go to a faster train conductor, he has to prove that he can be just as fast as a robot! // Adelaide wants to help the city cats clean up their acts for adoption, but can she help these grumpy gatos?

programme.title: Fool's Gold / Flight Plan
programme.desc: When they find a treasure map, the Casagrandes go on a wild search for Pancho Villa's gold. // Frida and Carlos go on a fancy plane ride, but Carl and CJ try to sneak on for an adventure of their own.

programme.title: Sandy's Nutmare / Bulletin Board
programme.desc: Sandy creates the latest acorn-based food sensation, but her tree pays the price for her greed. // SpongeBob erects a community bulletin board in the Krusty Krab, but anonymous reviews posted on it lead to trouble.

programme.title: Danger Games
programme.desc: Frustrated by his failed villainy, Dr. Minyak plans to ruin Double G's worldwide charity concert. Captain Man and Kid Danger join forces with the Game Shakers to defeat Dr. Minyak and keep Double G safe.

programme.title: Cherry Bad Things
programme.desc: Cherry visits, and the Thundermans discover she still has her superpowers. Cherry promises to remove them after her girls' day with Phoebe and Chloe, but the powers malfunction and puts the group in danger. Max hosts Jinx, making Colosso jealous.

programme.title: Hogi Pyaar Ki Jeet
programme.desc: Two brothers reunite in order to fulfil the wish of their dying father whom Thakur bitterly humiliates and murders. They intend to marry Thakur's two daughters to seek revenge. Release Year: 1999 Director: P. Vasu

programme.title: The Power
programme.desc: When Kalidas refuses to strike a drug deal, an attempt is made on his life. The assassination goes haywire, leading to the death of an innocent man. Release Year: 2021 Director: Mahesh Manjrekar

programme.title: Banjo
programme.desc: Taraat, a local banjo player seeks fame, success and money. In his pursuit, he crosses path with Chrisina who helps him accomplish his goals. Release Year: 2016 Director: Ravi Jadhav

programme.title: Hacked
programme.desc: Sameera's boyfriend disappoints her on her birthday and she ends up sleeping with Vivek. Vivek hacks into everything and makes her life miserable. Release Year: 2020 Director: Vikram Bhatt

programme.title: Hum Aapke Hain Koun
programme.desc: Nisha's elder sister Pooja marries Rajesh. Soon Rajesh's younger brother Prem and Nisha fall in love. Release Year: 1994 Director: Sooraj R. Barjatya

programme.title: Indian
programme.desc: A policeman, Raj, nabs a terrorist, Wasim Khan, and is praised by his father-in-law, another high-ranking officer. However, when his father-in-law is mysteriously killed, Raj is blamed for the murder. Release Year: 2001 Director: N. Maharajan

programme.title: RRR
programme.desc: In 1920, fate brings together two revolutionaries fighting their individual battles against the British empire far away from home.

programme.title: Jawan
programme.desc: A high-octane action thriller which outlines the emotional journey of a man who is set to rectify the wrongs in the society. Release Year: 2023 Director: Atlee Kumar

programme.title: Lost
programme.desc: The tale of crime reporter Vidhi, who is out to find a missing college student. Her quest reveals the many layers of society that redefine politics, love, and betrayal. Release Year: 2022 Director: Aniruddha Roy Chowdhury

programme.title: PARA PENCARI TUHAN 15
programme.desc: Bang Jack plans to build a special boarding school for the elderly. Bang Jack is assisted by his assistant named Habib. Habib is a handsome young man who becomes the child of one of the students.

programme.title: BUMI CENDRAWASIH PAPUA
programme.desc: Ikhsan intends to work in the city, but the city dwellers annoy him with their arrogant behavior. Ikhsan is forced to return to work at his father Mawar's cattle farm. Mawar is madly in love with Ikhsan.

programme.title: Jagain Jodoh Orang Jangan Ya Dek Ya
programme.desc: Feni has a boyfriend named Madun. However, their love story does not go smoothly and is not approved by her parents. Madun only earns a modest income and works as a motorcycle taxi driver. Feni's mother forbids him from approaching Feni until he becomes rich. Feni decides to end her relationship with Madun, but Madun refuses. Feni goes to the city to find a rich husband.

programme.title: KARNAVAL SCTV 2024

programme.title: Sistematika Cinta Anti Selip
programme.desc: Bimantara who approaches Livia in order to get a prestigious position in her company. Apparently, Bimantara's presence brings a positive aura for Livia who has just broken up with her ex. The ex, named Devan, was known to have cheated with her business rival, Marsya. Bimantara also helps Livia prove that Devan was being unfaithful. What will happen next?

programme.desc: The SCTV Carnival is a variety show broadcast on SCTV that comes to your city. It is enlivened by the cast of SCTV soap operas and local musicians. This time, the SCTV Carnival is coming to Indramayu with special and surprising guest stars.

programme.title: Biarin Aja Aku Cinta Kamu Selama Gak Makan Ternak Warga
programme.desc: Winda (Shanice Margaretha) has been arranged to marry a man named Devan by her father, but Winda refuses and chooses to run away from home. While on the road, Winda's car accidentally hit a goat named Timmy, owned by Ikbal (Kevin Hillers). As the leader of the group, Winda apologized for causing Timmy's accident. Winda promised to take responsibility.

programme.title: My Dosen Is My Husband
programme.desc: Gita (Hana Saraswati) must agree to marry Fajar (Fendy Chow) because they were caught by the neighborhood security guard doing something indecent. Unexpectedly, Fajar turned out to be a lecturer at the university where Gita studied.

programme.title: Bukan Syurga Pilihan
programme.desc: Selepas kematian Zahid, kehidupan Datuk Ilya terus diganggu oleh seseorang namun Datuk Ilya tidak memberitahu kepada Megat Arif kerana dia tidak mahu Megat Arif tahu bahawa Zaid telah dibunuh.

programme.title: Sejuta Rasa Buat Adelia
programme.desc: Chef Adelia terpaksa menempuh sejuta perasaan dan rasa, demi membuktikan kebolehannya untuk memasak apabila mendapat tahu lelaki yang mengkritik makanannya adalah bos barunya, Idlan.

programme.title: Kutinggalkan Cinta di Okinawa
programme.desc: Mengisahkan tentang Alisa yang cuba untuk menjejaki ibu kandungnya. Sepanjang perjalanan itu dia mengenali Raykal dan Shun. Siapakah di antara dua lelaki ini yang dapat memenangi hati Alisa?

programme.desc: Siapa yang rindu dengan celoteh Kak Kek boleh tengok Kak Kek dalam rancangan terbarunya, Kak Kek & Abe Mmasok!

programme.title: Dendam Cinta Arissa
programme.desc: Perkahwinan Arissa & Zariman musnah apabila Rafeal melanggar Zariman dan melarikan diri untuk mengejar isterinya. Ingin jujur pada Arissa namun Rafeael jatuh cinta dengan Arissa tanpa sengaja.

programme.title: Unplugged 2019
programme.desc: Persembahan artis-artis tempatan dengan gabungan lagu baru dan lama bersama hos Elly Arifin dalam membongkar rahsia di sebalik pembikinan lagu tersebut.

programme.title: Dahlia
programme.desc: Dahlia memiliki segalanya, namun semuanya musnah akibat sikap khianat kawan baiknya sendiri yang ingin merampas semua miliknya termasuk suami, anak & harta.

programme.title: Cinta Tiada Ganti
programme.desc: Mengisahkan percintaan yang penuh dengan emosi dan dugaan antara Ara dan Ashraf.

programme.title: Aiman Tempe Mania The Series
programme.desc: Aiman yang berumur 6 tahun petah bercakap dan berfikiran lebih matang sentiasa membantu orang disekelilingi untuk menyelesaikan masalah mereka.

programme.title: Memori Pajeri Nanas
programme.desc: Rumahtangga Armand dan Kayla dilanda masalah dan Kayla minta dilepaskan. Armand telah meletakkan satu syarat sebagai cubaan terakhirnya untuk memenangi hati Kayla semula. Apakah syarat itu?

programme.title: Resepi Memikat Isteri
programme.desc: Musim kali ini giliran suami untuk memujuk dan memikat isteri pula melalui masakan mereka.

programme.title: Bintang Minggu Ini
programme.desc: Saksikan konsert dari artis artis popular terus ke rumah anda.

programme.title: Renovate
programme.desc: Dihoskan oleh Daiyan Trisha, dia akan mencari rumah yang asalnya biasa atau lama tetapi telah diubahsuai menjadi cantik dengan bantuan arkitek yang berpengalaman.

programme.title: Bukan Syurga Pilihan

programme.title: Stella On Stage
programme.desc: Letih melayan pelbagai dugaan yang dihadapi Stella. Nik tekad untuk menukarkan identiti baru Stella dengan bapanya, Corrie dan dunia seni buat selama-lamanya!

programme.title: Unplugged 2019

programme.title: Lelaki Macam Dia
programme.desc: Fahmi dan Husna merupakan jiran yang tinggal bersebelahan rumah. Fahmi seorang yang lurus dan tidak mempunyai perwatakan yang menarik akhirnya mampu berubah menjadi seorang "superstar" dan memikat hati Hus

programme.title: Aiman Tempe Mania The Series
programme.desc: Aiman yang berumur 6 tahun petah bercakap dan berfikiran lebih matang sentiasa membantu orang disekelilingi untuk menyelesaikan masalah mereka.

programme.title: Teroka Lokal

programme.title: Jejak Jepun Jihan S2
programme.desc: Mengembara bersama Jihan Muse di negara matahari terbit. Nikmati keunikan dan realiti kehidupan masyarakat Jepun selain perkongsian info dan tips untuk mereka yang ingin bercuti ke sana.

programme.title: Bukan Syurga Pilihan
programme.desc: Desakan Tihani untuk menyuruh Megat Arif melepaskannya terus bermain di fikiran Megat Arif. Adakah Megat Arif akan melepaskan Tihani sebagai tanda kasihan di atas perbuatan Datuk Ilya?

programme.title: Gadis Semasa
programme.desc: Realiti TV yang mengikuti sekumpulan rakan baik sosial media meluangkan masa seharian bersama, menyertai pelbagai aktiviti menarik bersama di Selangor dan Kuala Lumpur.

programme.title: Sedapur Bersama

programme.title: Stella On Stage
programme.desc: Amnah hairan Stella sanggup bersusah payah untuk merawat Rara yang terkena HFMD. Padahal Corrie dan Rozie adalah ibu bapa Rara yang sebenar. Nik menyelamatkan Sofi daripada diserbu oleh pihak polis.

programme.desc: Hung Shu-Kan owns a logistics business. The only thing on his mind is the well-being of his three daughters. programme.title: (PG) Episode 5 (Malay Subtitles)
programme.desc: (Dual language Malay and English) (Dual Language - English and Malay) Mechamato is a Malaysian animated series produced by Animonsta Studios, focusing on a boy named Amato and his partner robot MechaBot, who fight against bad robots. The animated series aired on Cartoon Network Asia from 4 December 2021 to 26 February 2022. Mechamato is a part of the BoBoiBoy franchise and the series also takes place before the original series and BoBoiBoy Galaxy.

programme.title: Episode 8 (English/Malay Subtitles)
programme.desc: Soccer buddies Myra and Wani were tasked to learn and prepare the traditional Sotong Masak Hitam, and one of Nyonya's timeless recipe Ayam Pongteh. Chef Firdauz Nasir also shares valuable tips on how to clean a squid and at the same time, extracting the squid ink from the body.

programme.title: (PG) Episode 28 (English/Malay Subtitles)
programme.desc: Badrul returns from his overseas studies and has started working in Malaysia. Badrul, Faza, Icha and Humaira reunited and met up as a welcome party for Badrul.

programme.title: (PG) Episode 31 (English/Malay Subtitles)
programme.desc: Iris plans to help Zainab escape from getting married to someone she doesn't like. She pleads with Firman to help her out.

programme.title: (PG) Episode 11 (English/Malay Subtitles)
programme.desc: Mengejar Mentari Sr 2 (Pursuit of Happiness Sr 2)_x000D_Returns for a second season. chronicling the life journey of Irman and Sapiah. In their pursuit to find happiness in life, they are faced with numerous challenges which weaken their efforts to achieve their desired destination.

programme.title: (PG) Episode 5 - Attention (English/Malay Subtitles)
programme.desc: Neng is shocked when she meets Tipez as they share a secret. Tipez cannot resist looking at Rosie’s personal belongings. Imah cannot find her jewellery and Mel grows suspicious of Neng. Wiwik senses something different when she meets Ramli.

programme.title: (PG) Episode 1 (English/Malay Subtitles)
programme.desc: Tells the story about a girl named Alesha who does not get the love of a mother. After a few years, Alesha was taken to Jakarta with her grandmother, Masitoh.

programme.title: (PG) Pelita (English/Malay Subtitles)
programme.desc: Hosted by Khairudin Saharom and Marina Yusoff, Pelita is an info-drama series to raise community awareness and emotional and social support programs for cancer patients and their families. Viewers will get wholesome coverage and perspectives from various segments from critical conversations to reenactments of inspiring stories of individuals battling cancer. This 5 parter aims to inspire change and support those in need._x000D_

programme.title: (PG) Episode 18 (English/Malay Subtitles)
programme.desc: Nuha and Nuh embrace married life, with Nuh standing firmly by her side against Adita and Arra's harsh words. Meanwhile, Awal is shaken by the discovery that Sarah is his half-sister, yet remains convinced she’s out to deceive his family.

programme.title: (PG) Episode 12
programme.desc: Upon overhearing that Riz has a girlfriend, she runs away from Riz. Puan Sri Vee calls on her son, Raizal, to return and take control of the company.

programme.title: (PG) Episode 5 (Malay Subtitles)
programme.desc: (Dual language Malay and English) (Dual Language - English and Malay) Mechamato is a Malaysian animated series produced by Animonsta Studios, focusing on a boy named Amato and his partner robot MechaBot, who fight against bad robots. The animated series aired on Cartoon Network Asia from 4 December 2021 to 26 February 2022. Mechamato is a part of the BoBoiBoy franchise and the series also takes place before the original series and BoBoiBoy Galaxy.

programme.title: Episode 9 (English/Malay Subtitles)
programme.desc: Arif cannot stop chattering in the kitchen while his teammate, Sohana, is quiet and focussed while peparing the dishes. How would this different personality clash while preparing Chef Amri's dishes of the week?

programme.title: (PG) Episode 29 (English/Malay Subtitles)
programme.desc: Icha gives birth in Badrul’s car when she is running away from suspecting Saiful having an affair at work. Saiful and Icha’s relationship become strained due to the suspicions. Faza gets closer to Diana to try and get her to remember her past.

programme.title: Episode 169
programme.desc: (Live) Catch the latest local and international news on Suria.

programme.title: Episode 7 (English/Malay Subtitles)
programme.desc: Pencipta kandungan Suzairhe Sumari dan Hafiz Aziz berkongsi tentang minat masyarakat yang di luar jangkaan apabila mereka mengetengahkan konten yang melibatkan dunia seram dan alam mistik, serta pengalaman peribadi yang menyeramkan sewaktu mereka berusaha mendapatkan konten yang menarik. Juga, artis seni pasir Mystifying Imran menghasilkan lukisan pasir yang menarik.

programme.title: (PG) Episode 19 (English/Malay Subtitles)
programme.desc: Nuha faces a tough decision about undergoing a bone marrow transplant, afraid of burdening Nuh further. Meanwhile, Arra’s plot to drive Nuha out of the house backfires.

programme.desc: Haila overhears Erman’s conversation with Kamariah about Katrina, leaving her shaken. To make matters worse, Erman refuses to believe that Kamariah has been mistreating her, further straining their already fragile marriage.

programme.title: Sing

programme.title: Z-Investigation
programme.desc: Hosted by senior CTi News reporter "Old Z", this in-depth social affairs program revisits major cases that once shook Taiwan. Through detailed reexaminations, viewers gain fresh insights into the events that shaped society.

programme.title: Rose, Be My Love
programme.desc: Not a love triangle but a love 'rectangle', Rose, Be My Love is a romantic drama set on the eve of World War II that represents the high standards achieved by Shaw Brothers in both aspects of star power and technical polish.

programme.title: Shadow Girl
programme.desc: A young swordswoman becomes invisible during the day and a monster at night after taking her grandma's pill. She ruined the wedding of a bandit chief's daughter using her powers and is hunted down by them for revenge. Will she escape the hunt?

programme.title: Facets Of Love
programme.desc: Set in the Ming Dynasty, the story revolves around a brothel and the girls who work there. The film begins by following the life of a girl from a poor family, who is sold by her mother to the brothel. While she is the most beautiful of the girls and attracts many clients, the girl hopes to escape this sad way of life one day.

programme.title: Sunset
programme.desc: Teenage heart-throbs Ching Li and Paul Chin Pei come across like Annette Funicello and Frankie Avalon in the musical Sunset, a musical romp that plays similar to one of Hollywood's famous "Beach Party" movies. A car load of girls meets a car load of boys, and Ching and Paul ultimately fall in love. Yet the film takes an acrid twist and turns out to be more like a Shakespearian tragedy than a beach-babe party.

programme.title: The Golden Knight
programme.desc: The heroine Yu Fei Xia is accused of stealing the book of martial arts secrets. To prove her innocence, she disguises herself as a man and finds her way into the Shaolin Temple to find out the truth...

programme.title: My Rebellious Son
programme.desc: A corrupt official attempts to steal a priceless Buddha statue from a temple to please a group of Westerners. Luckily, Doctor Zhang and his son manage to defeat the Western boxers, the Japanese Kendo opponents and the Western longsword fighters with Chinese kung fu, thus saving the Buddha statue.

programme.title: Lady General Hua Mu-Lan
programme.desc: Mulan disguises herself as a male soldier to replace her aged father in a war against the barbarians. Her courage brings her victory in battles and she was promoted to a general. When Mulan returns home with glory, the chief commander asks her to marry his daughter, forcing Mulan to reveal her true identity.

programme.title: Two Champions of Shaolin
programme.desc: Set in the Qing Dynasty, the Shaolin clan wants to overthrow Qing and restore the Ming Dynasty, while the Wudang clan is backed by the Qing government. The two renowned clans eventually set themselves up against each other, and a series of vicious fighting has just begun...

programme.title: The Dream of the Red Chamber
programme.desc: Adapted from the most widely read and filmed novel in Chinese history, this version is said to be the most successful one. Betty Loh's looks, demeanour and aura in her portrayal of Lin Dai Yu has won her the epithet "Classic Beauty".

programme.title: The Hidden Power Of Dragon Sabre
programme.desc: Defeated villain Sung Ching Shu returns and starts a reign of terror, trapping a beautiful Mongolian Princess and mastering the "yin and yang combination" to become almost invincible. Only two swords held by two great swordsmen can stand in his way!

programme.title: Mr Funny - bone
programme.desc: Join Mr Funny bone in a series of comic vignettes as he attempts to win the heart of a dashing lady. Along for the ride is his loyal sidekick Mr Big Potato, a stout fellow who is forever getting into silly mishaps. The pair gets involved in plenty of shenanigans and gags!

programme.title: The Kid With A Tattoo
programme.desc: Young Bao Tong witnesses the brutal murder of his kung fu master by a vicious villain. A large eagle tattoo on Bao's chest was spotted by the killer as he escapes. Can Bao escape from the killer?

programme.title: Moonlight Serenade
programme.desc: A sweet inn-keeper's daughter is witness to a perverted rape, leading to more danger than most romantic dramas can handle. Can her true love rescue her in time? For this movie, the moonlight serenade is the sound of suspense, leading to more danger than most romantic dramas can handle.

programme.title: Mad Monkey Kung Fu
programme.desc: Master Chen was an esteemed Monkey Kung Fu master, until he is framed and crippled by a ruthless villain and ends up becoming a wandering artiste. When Chen meets a young man, Little Monkey, on the streets, he decides to teach him all his monkey kung fu moves. Both men eventually team up to avenge Chen's past insult.

programme.title: The Amorous Lotus Pan
programme.desc: Adapted from the renowned Chinese novel, The Water Margin, this is the story of a poor and beautiful girl Lotus Pan, who is raped by her master and had to be married off to a midget who treats her badly. Lost and lonely, Pan unwittingly becomes a pawn in the game of lust between her husband's playboy brother Wu Song, and a murderous man Men Ching.

programme.title: You're Just Not Her
programme.desc: The couple Lam Shun and Ha Lee, living together for years, see their love fading and differences emerging about their future. After a car crash, Ha Lee transforms into a charismatic romantic, but she appears to be a different person entirely. What secrets lie behind this sudden change?

programme.title: Vengeance of the Bride
programme.desc: Eun Seo Yeon is not rich, but everyone knows she has a warm heart. One day, she discovers that the man, Kang Baek San, whom she calls 'father' is actually her real parents' enemy! She embarks on a revenge journey...

programme.title: Peng vs. Peng
programme.desc: With the sudden closing of a local candy shop, NaiNai is busy trying to recreate its famous candied fruit. But after a late-night sugar binge in NaiNai’s stash, Peng starts acting strangely. It turns out that he’s possessed by magical creatures! The Minticon are sugar-addicted puffball creatures, who previously lived in the old candy shop. Armed with her violin, Yi commands the creatures out of Peng’s body, winning over the Minticon in the process.

programme.title: Jin's New Look
programme.desc: On the brink of his highly-anticipated White Coat Ceremony at school, Jin proudly dons his new white doctor’s coat around town, unwittingly drawing the attention of a creature named Morty. After a slobbery lick from Morty, Jin turns invisible! As Jin frantically tries to become re-visible, he discovers that Morty is very pregnant! Ultimately, Jin foregoes his ceremony and instead delivers Morty’s five babies.

programme.title: First Flight: Part 1
programme.desc: Moving to an exotic new home, an adventurous teenager meets a new group of kids and discovers a dragon in the fissure.

programme.title: Eye Of The Beholder Pt 2
programme.desc: Hiccup, Toothless and the Dragon Riders journey to Glacier Island in search of the Snow Wraith, a fearsome dragon that holds key to the Dragon Eye's mysteries.

programme.title: What Flies Beneath
programme.desc: Toothless encounters a rival from his past.

programme.title: Curse of the Monkey King
programme.desc: Po and the Kids take a shortcut to the boat bound for the Forbidden City, and are waylaid by a tricky monkey. Zhizhu informs Mayor Li of some distressing sounds coming from the Wellspring.

programme.title: Uh-Oh, Canada
programme.desc: The Wanderers and Whitebeard visit Wizard Blizzardbeard in Quebec City, Canada, for the big Wanderers Ice Hockey Tournament. When Odlulu uses the Invisibility Key on herself and Fritz, they become an unstoppable, invisible hockey-playing duo. Wally and Wenda must pursue Odlulu on the rink and throughout Quebec City to retrieve the Invisibility Key.

programme.title: Gimme, Gimme, Gimme: The Game
programme.desc: King Julien becomes so enthralled with the idea of money that he introduces it to the kingdom.

programme.title: Wet Hot Ahhh Valley Summer / Grug Vs The Moon
programme.desc: When Eep and Thunk challenge each other in the first-ever dare-off, Thunk faces the deep end - his greatest fear; Grug picks a fight with the moon.

programme.title: Lucky And The Treacherous Trail
programme.desc: When Lucky gets wind of an advanced trail ride she decides to become the best frontier girl anyone has ever seen.overnight

programme.title: Lair
programme.desc: D-Structs kidnaps Revvit to show the crew who's boss when they compete over construction, so Ty plans the perfect heist to rescue their friend.

programme.title: From Days Long Ago
programme.desc: The Blue Lion delivers the team to an alien planet where they discover a mysterious castle. Inside, they awaken an alien princess who sends them on a mission to find the remaining lions.

programme.title: Agent Ace/Smoove As Ice
programme.desc: Chet can't get him on a cereal box, so Turbo makes Ace Gecko his sports agent; Smoove Move competes in a ski race to prove his worth -- all for love.

programme.title: Disappearing Act/Sting Of Justice
programme.desc: When a bad magic trick makes Chet disappear, Turbo and Burn work together to find him; A superhero hornet arrives in Turbotown and stirs up trouble.

programme.title: Bridge to Meowbuquerque / No Part Harmony
programme.desc: Today is Yarn Ball Day, a special day in the cat-filled town of Meowbuquerque. Unfortunately, the bridge leading to the party is broken. With time ticking, Tag, Scooch, and Kit work together at getting the cats across to the party. / When The Barkapellas announce that they’re cancelling their biggest concert ever, Tag is determined to figure out why in order to get them back on stage. But with a stadium full of impatient fans, Tag is going to have to work fast.

programme.title: Family Trip / Great Great Grandicorn
programme.desc: Kelp and Scallop help Dad discover the true meaning of family trips. / When the Great Great Grandicorn comes to visit, the kids learn that making mistakes is part of learning.

programme.title: Captain Underpants and the Costly Conundrum of the Calamitous Claylossus
programme.desc: George and Harold transform the school's mysterious student into a giant clay monster who turns the entire town into clay

programme.title: Trading Up
programme.desc: Boss takes an overdue vacation day, and ends up teaching Tabitha the value of "trading up" valueless objects into something she actually wants, an electric scooter. However, a 5%er baby is in trouble and BB's field team has "got it under control"… or do they? Boss tries to juggle his Tabitha lessons with sneaking peeks at the mission in progress

programme.title: Straycation Part II
programme.desc: While the parents are away, the kids are in charge of the tree house, but when the punch monkeys invade the house, the kids find themselves out of their element.

programme.title: The Ditch Sitch
programme.desc: The crew gets their first ping on their new creature-helping app! A dried up jellyfish-type creature has been discovered at a construction site, and the anti-creature contractor wants it GONE. The crew try taking Jelleen to the sewers to live with Sewer Koi, but the unhappy creature creates a blackout in the sewers with its magical electric charge.

programme.title: It Flies in the Family
programme.desc: Eugene discovers the Lair and demands a dragon of his own.

programme.title: Switcher-Ruby/Bye Bye Bunker
programme.desc: Poppy and Branch switch bodies, and learn to appreciate each other’s point of view. /When Branch decides it’s time for him to move out of the bunker, Poppy tries to be as supportive as she can, even though it seems Branch himself may have some doubts.

programme.title: Flying High / Nest Sweet Nest
programme.desc: Marcus makes a Dew Drop-sized hot-air balloon for Phoebe and the Dews have a blast helping their kids from above, including secretly guiding Lola back to her family, before she accidentally follows Hip-Hop the frog out of the park. / Phoebe makes a pair of glasses for Bob the bird, but when seeing things clearly for the first time gets him lost, the Dews help Bob find his nest before his family arrives for a visit.

programme.title: Level Up / Reed and the Beanstalk
programme.desc: The Dews think a double rainbow is making their powers change, but what they discover is that they are about to graduate to a new level of Dew Dropness, with the newfound ability to float in the air! / When Reed discovers he’s being assigned a family, he runs to tell Athena, only to find Athena and her house are missing! While Eden and Phoebe search for Athena, Reed’s on Dew Drop duty for Athena. After successfully helping Athena's kids, Reed is assigned the family in the apartment below Athena.

programme.title: Rodney J. Dinkle, Babysitter / Lights Out
programme.desc: When accident-prone Rodney gets hired to babysit a mischievous toddler, TZG secretly watches over their safety. / When there’s a power outage in Harmony Harbor, TZG secretly helps the townsfolk beat the blackout.

programme.title: Double Booked / Gym Enemy Cricket
programme.desc: When both Sam and Gabriel pre-order the new Commander Kale comic but the supplier only sends one copy, TZG secretly ferries the comic book back and forth between readers. / When Fawna teaches a silent yoga class, TZG secretly find and remove a loud chirping cricket from the Community Center.

programme.title: Belly Flop
programme.desc: The Riders have to save Elbone when he's swallowed by a giant Sea Gronckle, and Dak's awful cooking might be just the thing to do it.

programme.title: Game of Horns
programme.desc: At a big town festival, Magnus challenges Duggard in a competition to be chief of Huttsgalor! Can the Riders help their friend keep his helmet?

programme.title: Memory Spark / Wondertusk
programme.desc: Kelps learns about memory spark in an attempt to relive a memory of his grandmother. / Kelp and the underwater gang put on a show to showcase their imaginary sparks. As she practices, however, Scallop becomes convinced her tusk has a real spark!

programme.title: Clamshell Day
programme.desc: Kelp is excited to celebrate his right of passage, breaking the ice with his horn. But when he struggles to break the ice like other narwhals, he is determined to do it "the Kelp way."

programme.title: Lucky and the Rough Ride
programme.desc: The PALs join AI and Javier on a mustang drive, but when Javier gets injured, it’s up to Lucky and Spirit to get him to safety

programme.title: Lucky and the Ghostly Gotcha!
programme.desc: When Snips claims not to be afraid of ghosts, the PALs decide to give him a fun Halloween scare he’ll never forget!

programme.title: Si
programme.desc: Puss fights the Duchess to retrieve the first coin he ever took from the Treasure House, which can help him restore San Lorenzo's protective spell.

programme.title: No
programme.desc: Puss in Boots returns to San Lorenzo at the behest of Dulcinea, to flush out an imposter masquerading as the town's protector.

programme.title: Captain Underpants and the Troublesome Treachery of the Thieving Toot Fairy
programme.desc: George and Harold race against Mr. Krupp to try to get him fired before they get expelled

programme.title: Captain Underpants and the Tenuous Takedown of the Tyrannical Teachertrons
programme.desc: In the season opener, George and Harold have returned to school due to a technicality, but the school has been taken over by Melvin and a cyborg Melvin from the future! Their goal is to make the school extremely difficult by replacing all the teachers with Teachertron robots. Suffering under the new regime and without Mr. Krupp/Captain Underpants on hand to help, the boys hypnotize gym teacher Mr. Meaner and turn him into Sergeant Boxers to fight back.

programme.title: Frank and Beans with Chili / Little Hound on the Prairie
programme.desc: Beans is nervous that Frank is starting to make a new best friend, so Beans enlists Tag to help him win Frank back. \ Grandpaw and Grandmaw tell Tag the story of the early days of Pawston. Tag’s ancestor, Tagatha, built a steam-engine and turned Pawston from a one-house town into a thriving community.

programme.title: Clamshell Day
programme.desc: Kelp is excited to celebrate his right of passage, breaking the ice with his horn. But when he struggles to break the ice like other narwhals, he is determined to do it "the Kelp way."

programme.title: One Tricked Pony
programme.desc: An overworked and under loved Precious has to choose between the Templeton Family startup business or Crispin Biscuits’ fun playtime. Meanwhile, the company makes its first purchase: upgraded communicators! R & D Baby Simmons is reluctant to fix the model they have, which picks up signals from her favorite lvorian soap opera, "Bridges Aflame." Over a live broadcast, Simmons must convince the cast to tie up every loose plot thread before she has to lose the signal forever.

programme.title: Federal Slumber Party
programme.desc: Uncle Benji makes a surprise visit to the Templeton Family with a cute baby of his own: Lil Bit Guerrero! Tina gets jealous of Carol doting on Lil Bit, while Benji reveals that in order to make his daughter proud of him, he’s applied to become a Federal Agent. With Boss Baby’s cover at stake, it’s up to the Templeton Family to get Benji out of their hair as he sniffs around for a case that could garner the attention from federal law enforcement.

programme.title: Floaties
programme.desc: A bummed out Tina takes a vacation to the baby resort, Floaties! However, her mind is still back at work, and struggled to actually enjoy her vacation. And it gets worse when Crispin Biscuits switches electronic ID tags with her, causing everyone to assume Tina actually is Crispin Biscuits. With Crispin having booked her for a seemingly endless stay, Tina is trapped in a paradise nightmare, and in a tunnel of madness starts to think that she may even be Crispin.

programme.title: Captain Underpants And The Confusing Crisis Of The Conniving Captive
programme.desc: Melvin isn't exactly their friend ... but it's not like George and Harold can just let him be held captive by diabolical Biglyans, right? Right?!?

programme.title: There’s No Phil in Team
programme.desc: When Phil humiliates himself playing throw-go-nut with the punch monkeys, the Croods band together to help him regain his confidence. Unfortunately, Phil goes from confident to cocky and bets the farm on a game of throw-go-nut with the punch monkeys. Can_x000D_the Croods overcome the punch monkeys - and Phil - to save the farm?

programme.title: Thunder Games
programme.desc: When Gran announces it’s time to choose a new Thunder Sisters Queen, Ugga assumes she’s got it in the bag. But after a series of challenges (the Thunder Games), it becomes clear Gran might not be ready to step down.

programme.title: A Cabbage Kinda Day
programme.desc: Already stretched thin between responsibilities, Yi discovers one of Morty’s babies still in her building. She attempts to juggle her various responsibilities dumpling shop work, violin, magical creature childcare!), but it’s too much and she accidentally "loses" Mini-Morty. She’s going to need help from Jin and Peng to find Mini-Morty and return the baby creature to her mother.

programme.title: Yeti Superstitious
programme.desc: Right before basketball tryouts, Peng learns from NaiNai that it is his "big bad" year on the zodiac calendar - which means bad luck. Peng is skeptical at first, but after seeing the positive effects of adhering to NaiNai’s superstitions, he dives headfirst into learning all he can to secure his spot on the team. Eventually, he becomes so consumed that he "breaks up" with Yi and Jin because of their zodiac incompatibility.

programme.title: Toad-al Recall
programme.desc: A wish-granting toad drops into Yi and the crew’s life just as the dumpling shop is being reviewed by a food magazine writer. Overwhelmed by her efforts to help her mom and NaiNai in the shop, Yi asks the toad to spit up helpful items - but Jin and Peng aren’t so selfless. As a result of granting an abundance of wishes for the whole crew, the toad becomes too weak to continue.

programme.title: Un Week-End

programme.title: Un Soupcon
programme.desc: A man's corpse is found in his torched car. Pascal, the victim, was drugged before being executed. Suspicions lead Captain Delboscq on the trail of Isabelle, the deceased's wife. Her very ordinary-looking life is full of disturbing and suspicious details.

programme.title: Un Soupcon
programme.desc: While Delboscq is trying to shine a light on Isabelle's difficult past and her complex relationship with Pascal, new clues point to the victim's family. The son, Jeremie, is particularly hostile to his mother, and also criticized his father for his gambling addiction.

programme.title: Day 4 Afternoon Session (Table 1): R1-5 (Ronnie O'Sullivan vs Ali Carter)
programme.desc: The 2025 World Snooker Championship is a professional snooker tournament organised by the World Snooker Tour and will take place at the Crucible Theatre in Sheffield, England. The winner will receive £500,000 from a total prize fund of £2,395,000. Kyren Wilson is the defending champion and will attempt to to overcome the so-called "Crucible curse", under which no first-time champion has retained the title since the tournament moved to the Crucible Theatre in 1977.

programme.desc: The series depicts the stories of Pompeii's citizens with the threat of Mount Vesuvius bringing chaos and destruction. Arbaces's machinations and the persecution of Christians add to the growing tension.

programme.title: Roz and the Schnoz
programme.desc: Roz worries about the fate of her new baby when she discovers that the parents of her baby's father have two of the biggest noses she's ever seen.

programme.title: Forward March
programme.desc: The castaways are attacked on the island and must defend themselves.

programme.title: Gitano
programme.desc: The IMF hides a young prince from assassins by disguising him as a gypsy girl.

programme.title: Cold
programme.desc: The SVU is shaken when multiple members of the squad are determined to stop a conspiracy of dirty cops.

programme.title: Some Enchanted Evening
programme.desc: At ALF's urging, Willie hosts a Halloween costume party to impress his boss and get a better job. ALF decides to invite everyone to the scary bash becomes the celebrated figure of the evening.

programme.title: Flight #093 Is Missing (Undertow)
programme.desc: Airwolf with Hawke and Dominic on board volunteer for a rescue mission after they learn that Caitlin is a passenger on the missing plane.

programme.title: Twitch or Treat
programme.desc: Darrin is incensed when Endora makes a house appear near the Stephens home for a Halloween party. When Samantha begs her mother to remove the house, Endora decides to hold her party in the Stephens home.

programme.title: Dangerous Diaper Dan
programme.desc: Diaper Dan, secretly working for the A.J. Kimberly Adver-tising Agency, gives Samantha a baby rattle. Samantha, proud of Darrin's creative ability, describes his ad campaigns to Endora.

programme.title: 4x4
programme.desc: One night, four cases. Grissom and Brass get a stolen hummer and a taco stand. Warrick gets a dead car show girl. Sara and Greg get a dead bodybuilder. Nick gets a dead boy found on a bench.

programme.title: The Life of the Party
programme.desc: Desperate to make a love connection, Frasier and Niles join forces to throw a singles party -- and end up vying for the affections of the same woman.

programme.title: Ship Ahoax
programme.desc: Ginger tries to prevent the others from becoming crazy by predicting, in a seance, that a ship is coming.

programme.title: Phantoms
programme.desc: To fight an aging dictator's purge of young artists, an IMF member becomes a ghost and Paris assumes the guise of a man long dead.

programme.title: Chinese Restaurant 9
programme.desc: Making its debut in Africa, this season the program sets off from Tangier, Morocco, an iconic hub along the Maritime Silk Road. Through Chinese cuisine, it bridges China-Africa cultures and reimagines traditional dining with a modern twist. Get ready for a vibrant summer culinary journey across Asia and Africa.

programme.title: Only For Love
programme.desc: Hardworking financial reporter Zheng Shu Yi (Bai Lu) is determined to land a front-page story with Shi Yan (Dylan Wang) a successful young CEO that the whole city is talking about. She pulls all the stops, eventually gets through to him and even love blossoms.

programme.title: Hot Door Night
programme.desc: Catch all the fun and laughter right here as we bring you Taiwan's top-grossing variety entertainment show that will keep you wanting for more!

programme.title: Midnight Fly
programme.desc: With her marriage in crisis, Michele takes off to Europe for a vacation and meets a Japanese woman named Miki. As they become friends and travel together, Michele discovers that Miki is her husband's mistress. When Miki goes missing in Morocco, Michele does everything she can to find her but ends up paying a heavy price...

programme.title: Fat Choi Spirit
programme.desc: Andy is a mahjong master who is very popular in the neighbourhood. However, after being cursed by his ex-girlfriend, Andy always experiences bad luck when playing mahjong. Can he finally dodge this streak of bad luck?

programme.title: Girl with the Diamond Slipper
programme.desc: An aspiring TV actress gets into hot water when a stolen diamond is hidden in the shoes she bought for a party.

programme.title: Mr. Virgin
programme.desc: Mr. Virgin is a romantic comedy about a twenty-nine year-old man Chao Yu-ting (Alfred Chang) who has seemingly been cursed. He becomes paranoid when a Feng Shui expert tells him it will be unlucky for him to marry before the age of thirty... so comical chaos line the days up to his next birthday!

programme.title: The Myth
programme.desc: An archaeologist Jack, and a scientist William, stumble upon ancient Qin Dynasty artifacts that lead them to the mausoleum and mysteriously connects Jack to his past life as a warrior in ancient China, starting their mythical journey.

programme.title: Let's Make Laugh II
programme.desc: Bodyguard Ah Sun is sent to protect his boss' son, only to meet and fall in love with his mistress, the gorgeous Joey. As love blossoms between the two, the powerful boss finds out and all hell breaks loose!

programme.title: Golden Chicken
programme.desc: Ah Kam, a seasoned prostitute, gets locked inside an ATM vestibule with a thief. Both discover they are ill-fated in life and Ah Kam starts telling him her life story as a prostitute, from a teenage hooker to a PR girl in an upscale club in her thirties, as well as being a strip dancer, bar girl and masseuse.

programme.title: Dream Lover
programme.desc: Ka Shing meets Kitty one day and they fall quickly in love. However, Kitty disappears shortly and when they meet years later, she is already married. To comfort himself, Ka Shing asks a mystic master to let Kitty appear in his dreams so that he can be with her constantly, even though she can only be his dream lover...

programme.title: Shark Busters
programme.desc: During the financial crisis, a vast majority of Hong Kong people experience difficulties in repaying debts. During this time, loan sharks use ruthless ways to force debtors to repay their loans and it is up to Officer Lee and his underground team to hunt down the head of this illegal organization.

programme.title: God of Gambler's Return
programme.desc: The God of Gamblers, Gao Jin, quits gambling and live a quiet life with his wife. However, a Taiwanese crime boss wants to become the new God of Gamblers and get rid of him, so he kills Gao Jin's pregnant wife to force him to the casino table. Gao Jin is indignant and vows to fight the crime boss to avenge his wife's death.

programme.title: Everlasting Love
programme.desc: Young intern doctor Eric meets Pei Jun and quickly falls in love with her, unaware that she works as a hostess in a night club. Despite their social differences, can their love story defy the odds and lead to a happily ever after?

programme.title: Inner Senses
programme.desc: Haunted by recurring visions stemming from past traumas, Yan reaches out to psychiatrist Dr Jim to restore her sanity and overcome her troubled past. Yet, as Yan gradually heals, Jim finds himself haunted by the same disturbing images, as his suppressed memories resurface.

programme.title: Mr. Possessed
programme.desc: Riley is cursed by an evil spirit to not be able to approach any woman. When he falls in love with Siu Yu, Riley's mother decides to use her to help him vanquish the evil spirit. On their wedding night, Riley passes out after protecting Siu Yu from the attack of the evil spirit. Can the two finally break the curse?

programme.title: The Chinese Feast
programme.desc: Sun wants to start a new life as a chef in Canada and struggles to learn cooking skills from a restaurant owner, Au. While Sun will represent his restaurant to participate in a cooking competition, his skill is not good enough, and he has to seek help from a legendary master chef in order to win the ultimate challenge.

programme.title: Face to Face
programme.desc: Tamotsu dies in a skiing accident and his roommate Yoshio marries his wife as well as inherits his entire fortune. At Tamotsu's funeral, Yoshio sees a badly disfigured old man and that is only the beginning of an evil downfall for him...

programme.title: Justice For Mary
programme.desc: When Mary Scott is found murdered in her San Diego home in 1969, a case with few leads quickly loses steam. Years later, Mary's daughters grow determined to find answers about the mother they barely knew.

A longstanding feud comes to a head when two neighbours confront each other with guns; a school bus driver goes on a dangerous high-speed chase to outrun an irate parent who attacks her bus with a hammer.
A man risks his life to save his wife during a home invasion; two convenience store workers defend their workplace; a hairdresser is put in an unpredictable situation; and more.

programme.title: The Dark Days Of Bucks County

programme.title: Numbers
programme.desc: Peppa and her friends learn how to count by playing games at Madame Gazelle's daycare.

programme.title: Digging Up the Road
programme.desc: Peppa and her family are trying to get to the playground, but Mr Bull's roadworks are in the way.

programme.title: Freddy Fox
programme.desc: Peppa and her friends are playing hide and seek, but it is Freddy Fox with his super smelling nose who is the best at playing that game.

programme.title: Washing
programme.desc: Daddy Pig hangs his clean football shirt out to dry, but Peppa, George and Mummy splash it with mud. They put it in the wash, but Peppa puts her red dress in too - which turns Daddy's shirt pink!

programme.title: Polly's Boat Trip
programme.desc: Peppa and George go boating with Grandpa Pig and Polly Parrot, but later Grandpa Pig drops his mobile phone into the water.

programme.title: Delphine Donkey
programme.desc: Peppa's French friend Delphine Donkey comes to stay. Peppa takes Delphine to daycare for a visit, where they teach her the 'Bing Bong Song', the class' favorite song to sing.

programme.title: Going With The Flow / The Decoder
programme.desc: The Barbababies are bored, the rain is preventing them from playing outside. // Barbibul has created a clever decoder capable of translating the cries of animals.

programme.title: The Great Spring Clean
programme.desc: Barbamama wants the barbababies to tidy their bedrooms. They're hiding to escape the drudgery.

programme.title: School Bus Blaze!
programme.desc: BEEP BEEP! It's time for school in Axle City! But, when the students need help getting to school, it's up to Blaze to save the day by becoming... SCHOOL BUS BLAZE!

programme.title: The Pirate Grand Prix
programme.desc: It's Pegwheel the pirate's first race-and who better to join him than Pirate Blaze! Can they beat Crusher to the trophy and prove they're the best racers on the seven seas, or will strong winds and high altitudes get the better of them?

programme.title: Pups Save Morning Mountain Yoga
programme.desc: A rockslide leaves Goodway, Farmer Yumi and Garby stranded on the side of a mountain.

programme.title: Hum-Patrol to the Rescue!

programme.title: Pups Save Jake's Cake / Pups Save a Wild Ride
programme.desc: Ryder and the Pups need to help get a surprise birthday ice cream cake up to Jake's cabin. // Alex and Daring Danny X are snowboarding right for Risky Ridge and need help from the PAW Patrol.

programme.title: Pups Save a Yodeler
programme.desc: When Wingnut runs away from wolves that are attracted to his yodeling, he ends up trapped in a canyon. The Paw Patrol has to hurry to save him.

programme.title: The Crew Builds A Ferris Wheel / The Crew Builds A Farm Animal Yoga Space
programme.desc: Rubble & Crew want to give Grocer Gabriel the best beach day ever... including a ride on a brand new Ferris wheel at the boardwalk! // When Farmer Zoe's animals need some relaxation, the pups build a perfect place to practice yoga with Coach Karima.

programme.title: The Crew And Skye Build A Mountain Lodge

programme.title: Dora's Song For Papi / Pirate Piggies
programme.desc: Dora travels across the rainforest, creating a song for her dad so they can celebrate Papi-Dora day!/Dora is ready for the Churro Fiesta when the Pirate Piggies eat all the churros. Dora tracks down a treasure chest of golden churros to save the day!

programme.title: Doctor Drama / The White Whale
programme.desc: After injuring his fin, Hank is afraid to go to the doctor. // Baby and William search high and low for the most delicious flownuts in the ocean.

programme.desc: When a group of bunny slugs wander off, Vola sets out to round them up all by herself. // When William adopts a sea pig named Chumby, the little squirt is more trouble than William bargained for.

programme.title: Whistling
programme.desc: Peppa tries to learn how to whistle after she realizes that seemingly everyone but her can do it.

programme.title: Doctor Hamster's Tortoise

programme.title: Sun, Sea and Snow
programme.desc: Peppa and her friends and family are looking forward to a trip to the beach where they can make sandcastles, but when they arrive at the beach there is too much snow!

programme.title: Grandpa Pig's Computer
programme.desc: Mummy Pig gives her old PC to Granny and Grandpa Pig. Will they be able to use it?

programme.title: Hospital
programme.desc: Peppa and her playgroup friends go with Madame Gazelle to visit Pedro Pony, who is in hospital with a broken leg.

programme.title: Spring

programme.title: Miss Rabbit's Helicopter
programme.desc: Miss Rabbit takes Peppa and her family for a ride in her rescue helicopter.

programme.title: Baby Alexander
programme.desc: Baby Alexander is too young to talk, until Peppa teaches him his first word.

programme.title: Golden City
programme.desc: Set in the 60s in Jioufen, the story tells how three sworn brothers conquer the world with their bare hands. While connecting romance from the previous generation to the shared emotions with the present, the drama explores differences in generational values.
